name: Meatly Jam: "Pillars of Sanity"
description:
Help a struggling developer create his GoTY!

A small game created within 48 hours for the MeatlyJam.

Primary lead/coder/design/amatuer animator : Matthew

Art: From http://www.meatlyjam.com/gameassets
